Body:
Description: Hi support, 

We asked for confirmation regarding the behavior of the CAP policy when custom content applied in Outlook applications. Attached, you will find a document the scenarios and observations from our tests.

Our customer requires an official statement regarding this. Could you please provide information or documentation to confirm the expected behavior?

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
What We've Learned Updated: Asked for confirmation on CAP behaviour for Outlook.
Next Steps Updated: Confirmed the behavior for the customer.
